sentences.en: About forty prisoners are still barricaded inside the wrecked buildings.
sentences.cn: 仍有大约40名囚犯被困在严重损毁的建筑物中。

sentences.en: After forty years in the police force nothing much shocks me.
sentences.cn: 在警队呆了40年后，我对什么都见怪不怪了。

sentences.en: Daphne Farlow, at forty-five, still looked and spoke like an overgrown schoolgirl.
sentences.cn: 45岁的达芙妮·法洛外貌言谈都还像个稚气未脱的小女生。

sentences.en: Defence soaks up forty per cent of the budget.
Forty per cent of the population is suffering from malnutrition.
sentences.cn: 人口中有40%的人营养不良。

sentences.en: Forty-eight people have drowned after their boat capsized during a storm.
sentences.cn: 他们的船在暴风雨中倾覆后有48人溺亡。

sentences.en: Forty-one people are said to have been seriously hurt.
He had a chequered political career spanning nearly forty years.
sentences.cn: 他的政治生涯将近40年，其间起起伏伏。

sentences.en: He told us that her age was forty-eight or thereabouts.
sentences.cn: 他告诉我们她的年龄在48岁上下。

sentences.en: He was a big man of about forty, wide-shouldered and heavily built.
sentences.cn: 他是个40岁左右的高大男子，肩宽体壮。

sentences.en: I had to pay nigh on forty pounds for it.
sentences.cn: 我不得不为它花了将近40英镑。

sentences.en: On the foreign exchanges, the US dollar is up point forty-five.
sentences.cn: 在外汇交易中，美元上涨了0.45个百分点。

sentences.en: Over the past forty years plastics have revolutionised the way we live.
sentences.cn: 在过去的40年中，塑料彻底改变了我们的生活方式。

sentences.en: She can't be more than forty.
She was somewhat inclined to fat after forty.
sentences.cn: 四十岁以后她有点发胖了。

sentences.en: The place was built as a casino in the forties.
sentences.cn: 这个地方建于20世纪40年代，起初是一座赌场。

sentences.en: The plant provides forty per cent of the country's electricity.
sentences.cn: 全国总电量的40%是这家发电厂提供的。

sentences.en: Up to forty per cent of the students had overstayed their visas.
sentences.cn: 高达40%的学生签证均已过期。
